channel.title: Editing servers
channel.description: ive tried a few server sourrces now and I CANT EDIT THEM :S :confused: :eek: i can open and edit and save the client.java and those but nothing happends when i reboot the server... except that i can edit characters. but stuff like npcs, shops ,exp, skills and so on wont do what ive edited them to do in client.java... :| k sry im a n00b but ive done everything right and :( hm idk what i coulda done wrong[br][size=1]Posted on: February 24, 2007, 01:08:12 PM[/size][hr]please?[br][size=1]Posted on: February 24, 2007, 01:49:28 PM[/size][hr]cmon some1...i can also add that i mite hav something to do with my java..? when i run ServerFile it says it cant find the java process :|
